about_the_game:
Inescaped drops you into a deadly experiment where you and three other test subjects are locked inside a sprawling maze teeming with danger. The goal? Find a way out, if you can.

Starting with nothing but your wits, you’ll navigate the maze to collect valuable items while dodging the lurking monsters that haunt every corner. Bring back your loot to the Hall and trade it with the mysterious Vendor, saving up for the elusive Medallion. Only the Medallion can unlock the exit, but it comes at a steep cost: 30,000 Coins. Every risk you take could bring you closer to freedom—or set you back to zero.

Reviving in the Hall after death means dropping all your hard-earned items, and your coins vanish forever. Work together with other players, or go it alone. Will you escape... or will the maze become your final resting place?

Key Features:

  • High-Stakes Exploration: Scour the maze for items to sell, dodging monsters lurking in the shadows.

  • Risk and Reward: Survive to save your coins or risk losing them all.

  • Strategic Cooperation: Choose to team up or face the dangers solo.

  • Replayability: Randomized loot and respawn mechanics keep every attempt fresh.

Welcome to Inescaped

name: INESCAPED

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 / 11 - 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 1030
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
